sourcesContent:
const customColorCode = ` A custom color text `; const customClassCode = ` A custom class text `; const customThemeCode = ` A primary text A secondary text A dark text A light text A info text A warning text A danger text A success text `; const simpleCode = ` A simple text `; const sizeCode = ` A small text
medium {' '} default
A medium text
large
A large text
{'style={{ fontSize: \'75px\' }}'}
A custom size text `; export { customColorCode, customClassCode, customThemeCode, simpleCode, sizeCode, };
